resources.string: Each day is a new opportunity to grow and be a better version of myself.
Every challenge in my life is an opportunity to learn from.
There is no easy way from the earth to the stars
Good things are always coming into my life
While we wait for life, life passes
The soul becomes dyed with the colour of its thoughts
Ignorance is the cause of fear
The mind that is anxious about future events is miserable
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning end
Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth
